name: Gmail Hangout compact (almost like old GChat)
description:
Compact new Google Hangout (Google Chat replacement).
Important!!! For correct style work first set "Use dense roster" in General section of Hangout settings.

What's corrected:
- Hangout Contacts list
- Hangout Previous Conversations list
- + button pane (including New group creation)
additional_info:
v5 - 24 August 2018
* Fix "icons" size

v4 - 31 October 2017
* Fixed tiny "hole" in chat window between button pane and chat area.

v3 - 12 July 2017
+ Fix "colleague logo" during search on + button pane.

v2 - 7 July 2017
+ Fix few elements during search on + button pane.

v1 - 28 June 2017
* Initial
